scripts.build: npm run version && npm run gen && npm run compile
scripts.version: jq --slurpfile ver ../../version.json '.version = $ver[0].version' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf ./node_modules && cp ./LICENSE ./dist && cp ./package.json ./dist && cp ../../README.md ./dist && find . -mindepth 1 -path ./dist -prune -o -exec rm -rf -- {} + && mv ./dist/* . && rmdir dist
